articles.title: CFPB Sues Comerica Bank for Systematically Failing Disabled and Older Americans - Consumer Financial Protection Bureau
articles.description: The CFPB sued Comerica Bank for systematically failing its 3.4 million Direct Express cardholders - primarily unbanked Americans receiving federal benefits.
articles.content: WASHINGTON, D.C. Today the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau (CFPB) sued Comerica Bank for systematically failing its 3.4 million Direct Express cardholders - primarily unbanked Americans receivin… [+5604 chars]
